channel.title: Hi, i'm ninelore
channel.description: Recent content on Hi, i'm ninelore

item.title: About me
item.description: Many know me as ninelore, but my real name is Ingo. This is my personal Blog, and you should treat everything that you read in my blog posts as opinions if not stated otherwise. Childhood Born in the German State of Hesse, I got my first PC with the age of five, and my first contact with Linux with seven years. I lived a very rough childhood with, I dare to say, abuse.

item.title: Welcome to ninelore's Blog
item.description: Welcome to my new Blog I decided to make this Blog to write about my thoughs, how random they may be. Possible Topics could be: experience i made opinions i need to share tutorials whatever else could come in my mind Why i decided to start a Blog It was the recent Post of the Lutris founder Mathieu that ignited an uge inside me that i should share my thoughs.
